details.sectionContent: This event is all about your technical skills and applied knowledge about engines.

Dive into the heart of an automobile!! The aim is to explore the technical knowledge regarding automobile engineering. Spark your way through the elaborate rounds which would test your problem solving and reasoning skills. At the end, untangle the mysteries of an I.C. engine.

sectionContent.sectionContent: Participants have to give an online quiz which will test their technical knowledge and the quiz will cover areas of Aptitude, general knowledge followed by basic math and science. The time limit for first round will be 45 minutes. Once the quiz is over elimination will be done.

Number of components of an I.C. engine which are blacked out will be shown to participants. The participants will have to guess the components and write the names in the google form link which will be send to them in advance. At the end of round elimination will be done and only 3 teams will move forward.
Final three teams will get a chance to virtually assemble a 4 stroke I.C. engine under the guidance. And the team with lowest time to assemble correctly will be the winner.

details.sectionContent: This event is about testing your knowledge about Space & Space Innovation.

Discard the Telescope, Rejoice the Spaceship...!!The aim is to expand your knowledge regarding Space Science. Enlightenyour path through the rounds which would test your listening and discussion skills. In the end, you will be sharing your views and definitely gain some knowledge which will be helpful in your future.

sectionContent.sectionContent: > Participants have to attend the online session of our facilitator. \20b9 > There will be a talk regarding our event and participants will be well-informed about it by the facilitator. \20b9 > The time allotted for this round will be 1 hour approximately.

> Participants have to give a test to test their technical knowledge. The test will cover the areas of general knowledge by some sets of MCQs. \20b9 > The time allotted for this round will be 15 minutes. \20b9 > After this round elimination will be done.

> In the final round participants will be given a topic for the discussion. \20b9 > The participants will be tested according to their discussion skills, thought expressing skills & communication skills. \20b9 > The time allotted for this round will be 30 minutes approximately.

details.sectionContent: Make a self- propelled rocket with bottles

A tinge of general knowledge in the field of aeronautics as well as hands on experience in making a rocket. This event is a combination of knowledge and practicality with items easily available at home.

sectionContent.sectionContent: > In this round, the participants will have to give a rapid fire round in a group of 4 or 5. Time slots will be given to the participants between which they have to appear in the meet. The contestant that gives the maximum correct answers will be promoted to 2nd round.

> Those participants who cleared the 1st Round will be promoted to second round and will make a model rocket. \20b9 > Detailed apparatus required for making the model will be shared to the participants a day before the event. Every participant will be taught step by step to build their own models as well as how to launch those rockets will also be taught. \20b9 > The participant whose rocket will be built best and flies well will receive a prize.

details.sectionContent: This event includes detailed study of the incidents/cases happened in various disciplines and finding appropriate solutions to prevent that particular incident in future.

sectionContent.sectionContent: This event is a two day event and has a single round in which the group/individual will be given a case study topic through WhatsApp group. After that, on the second day, the group has to make a detailed presentation of that topic and have to present it. \20b9 > Day 1:- At the first day, weâ€™ll give the case study topics to the participants group so that they make presentation on it. \20b9 > Day 2:- On the second day, the participated group will present the case study topic which was given on the previous day. \20b9 > Day 2 will be conducted on Google Meet. \20b9 > Out of all the teams, the team which delivers the best solution to the topic irrespective of the field he/she/they belong to receives a prize.
